attributes.action: improve the awareness, earlier diagnoses, and treatment of Marfan Syndrome and HCTDs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a great need to raise awareness of Marfan Syndrome, in particular of its variable manifestations. Earlier diagnoses and understanding would not only prevent tragic deaths, but fundamentally alter the quality of life possible for those with the condition.
In this country a system does not exist where one can see a Marfan specialist about all the combining aspects of this difficult condition that affects many different systems in the body simultaneously. We need less departmentalization.In France and the US there are Marfan centres.Please could we have a similar arrangement here.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "improve the awareness, earlier diagnoses, and treatment of Marfan Syndrome and HCTDs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23046


Prime Minister's Office
